SEARCH
Package executor.service.service.scenario.result

Interface ScenarioResultService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JpaScenarioResultService
public interface ScenarioResultService
Service interface for managing scenario results.

The ScenarioResultService interface defines methods for creating and retrieving scenario results. Implementations of this interface provide functionality to interact with underlying storage systems, such as databases, to persist and retrieve scenario results. It is typically used in scenarios where execution results need to be managed and queried within an application.

The interface declares the following methods:

  • createScenarioResult(ScenarioResult): Creates and persists a scenario result.
  • getAllScenarioResults(String): Retrieves all scenario results associated with a specific user.

Implementing classes should provide concrete implementations for these methods, handling the creation and retrieval of scenario results. Additionally, it is expected that implementations handle communication with underlying storage systems, such as databases or repositories.

It is recommended for scenarios to use this interface to manage and query scenario results within an application, promoting a consistent and modular approach to result management.

See Also:
  • ScenarioResult
  • ScenarioResultResponse

  • Method Details

    • createScenarioResult

      void createScenarioResult(ScenarioResult result)
      Creates and persists a scenario result.

      The createScenarioResult method is responsible for creating and persisting a scenario result, typically representing the outcome of a scenario execution. Implementations of this interface should handle the storage or recording of the scenario result, ensuring it is properly saved or processed for future retrieval.

      The method takes a single parameter:

      • result: The ScenarioResult instance representing the scenario execution result to be created.

      It is recommended for implementing classes to perform necessary operations for storing the scenario result in an appropriate data store, such as a database or repository.

      Parameters:
      result - The ScenarioResult instance representing the scenario execution result to be created.
      See Also:
      • ScenarioResult

    • getAllScenarioResults

      List<ScenarioResultResponse> getAllScenarioResults(String username)
      Retrieves all scenario results associated with a specific user.

      The getAllScenarioResults method is responsible for retrieving all scenario results associated with a specific user. The user is identified by the provided username. Implementations should handle the retrieval of scenario results, optionally performing mapping or additional processing as needed.

      The method takes a single parameter:

      • username: A String representing the username for which scenario results are to be retrieved.

      The method returns a List of ScenarioResultResponse objects representing the mapped scenario results.

      It is recommended for implementing classes to perform necessary operations for retrieving and mapping scenario results associated with the specified user.

      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username for which scenario results are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of ScenarioResultResponse objects representing the mapped scenario results.
      See Also:
      • ScenarioResultResponse
